DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the blood cultures' profitability in intensive care unit and create a validated prediction rule for extractioning in critical patients.
DOC.brief_title: Blood Cultures's Profitability in Intensive Care Unit
DOC.detailed_description: Implementing a predictive rule blood cultures to determine the probability of positive or negative result, improving the profitability of the diagnostic test.
DOC.criteria: Patients who have been extracted blood culture sample Underaged, pregnants, Major burns.
